attributes.action: Modify ExCel London to a hospital/Recovery unit
attributes.additional_details:
As London has highest number of infected cases and mortality it is essential to think in advance in regards to facilities needed and with minimum spending ExCel conference centre could change to a big hospital.
What Chinese did in days by building 1000 beds hospital we can do it in London too.
attributes.background:
It is time the government should prioritise the health of the public and should consider how vital it is to be prepared for the next phase and predict what treatment and recovery facilities needed in coming week.
ExCel London offers good space for those need hospital beds and recovery facilities.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, it has been announced that the ExCel Centre in London will be converted into a hospital. You can find out more here: https://www.england.nhs.uk/2020/03/new-nhs-nightingale-hospital-to-fight-coronavirus/ 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
